org.alanly.calculator.logic
Class CalculatorInputHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.alanly.calculator.logic.CalculatorInputHandler

public class CalculatorInputHandler
extends java.lang.Object

The CalculatorInputHandler takes care of all user input to the calculator and produces the appropriate output. Valid key input values are listed in the following table:

    Key ValueFunction
    +Addition
    -Subtraction
    *Multiplication
    /Division
    .Decimal point
    ~Negate value
    =Solve equation
    CEClear Entry up to last previous operand
    CClear calculator
Invalid input values will throw an InputMismatchException.

Version:
1.3
Author:
Alan Ly
